member.name: T:FakeRestAPI.Web.App_Start.UnityConfig
member.summary: Specifies the Unity configuration for the main container.

member.name: M:FakeRestAPI.Web.App_Start.UnityConfig.GetConfiguredContainer
member.summary: Gets the configured Unity container.

member.name: M:FakeRestAPI.Web.App_Start.UnityConfig.RegisterTypes(Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Registers the type mappings with the Unity container.
member.remarks: There is no need to register concrete types such as controllers or API controllers (unless you want to change the defaults), as Unity allows resolving a concrete type even if it was not previously registered.

member.name: T:FakeRestAPI.Web.App_Start.UnityWebApiActivator
member.summary: Provides the bootstrapping for integrating Unity with WebApi when it is hosted in ASP.NET

member.summary: Integrates Unity when the application starts.

member.name: M:FakeRestAPI.Web.App_Start.UnityWebApiActivator.Shutdown
member.summary: Disposes the Unity container when the application is shut down.

member.summary: Gets the objects that are used directly as samples for certain actions.

member.summary: Gets the objects that are serialized as samples by the supported formatters.

member.name: P:FakeRestAPI.Web.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.name: T:FakeRestAPI.Web.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:FakeRestAPI.Web.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response
